name: Chuk'd In Space
description:
The long awaited sequel to Chuk Stuck!

Controls:

Marble Mode
Click - Place and rotate blocks.
Click the 'Simulate' button to test your track out!
Click the 'Space Ship' button to switch to...

Space Mode
WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim
Click the minimized Marble Mode screen to switch back to Marble Mode!

Good to know:

Chuk'd In Space consists of two minigames working together: Marble Mode and Space Mode.

The point of Marble Mode is to get a marble into the hole by building a little track.

If the marble reaches the end, your space ship will fire a projectile in Space Mode, where your goal is to defeat three bosses to save the Gooeys! Destroy enemies to unlock more blocks for Marble Mode.

The further your marble travels in Marble Mode, the more damage you will make in Space Mode! The faster it is when it reaches the end, the faster the projectile will be!

But be careful! If you're damaged in Space Mode a random, undeletable block will be placed somewhere in your Marble Mode track, forcing you to maybe rebuild.
